revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=MitraStar |model=GPT-2541GNAC |revision=VW-GV |asin= |fcc_date=01/27/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router,fiber gateway |fcc_id=ANATEL/03307-15-08916/ |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM68380 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3740BC |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L512E |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model=M15F1G1664A-ADBG |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3740BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217T |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=FXS Single SLIC;Microsemi;Le9541;;1; |flags=GPON, VoIP, |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.41-117.134;BCM96838;UBI; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.11;-rt19+; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=1234 |default_pass= |oui=B4:EF:FA |oui_eth=84:AA:9C }} {{TagLine|4-port GPON Home Gateway}} :[http://www.mitrastar.com/detail.php?lang=eng&ctwo=zxfsetghrtsyrrdytrt&cthr=gjkhg87fggy4eedu&unit=vcfytdhsrdrd Product page] *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ANATEL/03307-15-08916/ ANATEL/03307-15-08916/] (01/27/2016) {{see also|Askey RTF3505VW-GV|SerComm H500-s|MitraStar}} ===Specifications=== :HW Interface: *WAN: One Giga optical interface (SC/APC) *LAN: Four 10/100/1000 RJ-45 interfaces *WLAN: Two 2x2 2.4GHz external antenna, :Three 3x3 5GHz internal antenna *FXS: POTS port for 2 FXS *USB: Two USB 2.0 Host ports *LED indicators: Power, PON, Internet, Ethernet, :Wireless 2.4GHz, Wireless 5GHz, USB, VoIP *Power supply: 12V DC, 2A For accessing a complete shell in SSH, will be needed to specify the default user :and password of the router and the first command should be /bin/sh. For example, in unix like systems the command would be :ssh 1234@192.168.1.1 /bin/sh. Also, for activating and deactivating remote management services like http and ssh, :it can be done by the page http://192.168.1.1/remoteMGMT.html ==Images== *[https://cloud.disroot.org/s/zR6d7b7seodyNq8 Internal images]
